name: Flipped Judgment
description:
Play as the captain of a space ship as you flip levers to keep you ship from being destroyed. Follow your crew members' instruction to keep everything in a stable condition. Beware though, aliens can disguise them selves as other crew members. You must do the exact opposite of what an alien tells you to do.

All code, assets, music, etc was made by me in a 72 hour period for the Ben bonk game jam

Controls:

WASD / ARROW KEYS - Move

E - Flip levers

Esc - Pause / Unpause
